channel.title: Portal
channel.description:
Ok hey! and thanks for visitin this thread, Anyways... I have a portal that you need a key to enter to teleport with correct? Allright.. then its normal use is like this..
case #: teleX:blabla teleY:blabla sendMessage("sdknsjkdnasjdnakjsd");
Now how can I make that to where i dont get any errors i tryed like this..
case #: if(playerHasItem2(key#) { teleX:blabla teleY:blabla sendMessage("sdknsjkdnasjdnakjsd");
and just messed around with brackets.. but cant seem to figure it out.. How do I place this? Thanks. -BlkBandana aka, 3hitu

item.title: Portal
item.dc:creator: @Nirvana.Marijuana Nirvana.Marijuana
item.description:
@Nirvana.Marijuana wrote:

case 0: if(playerHasItem2(000)) { teleX = 0000; teleY = 0000; sendMessage("Your Message"); } else { sendMessage("Your Message") break;

Try that

Read full topic

item.description:
@3_HITTED_U wrote:

ok thx henry, it worked.

now i need to add it where it sends a msg if they DONT have the key (item) to enter the portal. ?? plx
